turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Nice to hear from you, what will it be today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'm trying to order an ice vanilla latte from the Pitz over on 9th in Brian in San Fancisco, California.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ice vanilla latte from peets got it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and you said the store on 9th and bryant sf.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, oh. Yeah, San Francisco, California. Yeah, 9th & Bryant.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: san francisco california, got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what type of milk do you want in your drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whole milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And size I want a medium, I guess.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok medium size with whole milk got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: any additional flavoring for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they have honey that they can add?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes they have honey.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do a just a little bit of honey, not too much I don't know. Like a splash, I don't know how they measure it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure a drizzle of honey right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Drizzle. There we go, that sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: that definitely sounds good. ok let me confirm your info with you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so we have 1 order of medium size ice vanilla latte with whole milk and a drizzle of honey is that your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok your drink has been order at the 9th and bryant peets coffee in san francisco.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thank you. I think that's it. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it will be ready for pickup shortly.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, enjoy your coffee.
